00026     KTSlidingWindowFFT::KTSlidingWindowFFT() :
00027             KTFFT(),
00028             fTransform(NULL),
00029             fTransformFlag(string("")),
00030             fIsInitialized(kFALSE),
00031             fIsDataReady(kFALSE),
00032             fOverlap(0),
00033             fWindowFunction(NULL),
00034             fTimeData(NULL),
00035             fPowerSpectra()

00039     KTSlidingWindowFFT::~KTSlidingWindowFFT()
00040     {
00041         delete fTransform;
00042         delete fWindowFunction;
00043         delete fTimeData;
00044         while (! fPowerSpectra.empty())
00045         {
00046             delete fPowerSpectra.back();
00047             fPowerSpectra.pop_back();
00048         }
00049     }

00051     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::InitializeFFT()
00052     {
00053         fTransform->Init(fTransformFlag.c_str(), 0, NULL);
00054         fIsInitialized = kTRUE;
00055         return;
00056     }
00057 
00058     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::TakeData(const KTEvent* event)
00059     {
00060         if (! fIsInitialized)
00061         {
00062             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSlidingWindowFFT::TakeData: FFT must be initialized before setting the data" << std::endl;
00063             std::cerr << "   Please first call InitializeFFT, and then use the TakeData method of your choice to set the data" << std::endl;
00064             return;
00065         }
00066 
00067         if (event->GetBinWidth() != fWindowFunction->GetBinWidth())
00068         {
00069             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSlidingWindowFFT::TakeData: Bin widths are mismatched between the given event and the window function." << std::endl;
00070             return;
00071         }
00072 
00073         fFreqBinWidth = event->GetSampleRate() / (Double_t)fWindowFunction->GetSize();
00074 
00075         this->TakeData((TArray*)(event->GetRecord()));
00076         return;
00077     }
00078 
00079     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::TakeData(const TArray* array)
00080     {
00081         if (! fIsInitialized)
00082         {
00083             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSlidingWindowFFT::TakeData: FFT must be initialized before setting the data" << std::endl;
00084             std::cerr << "   Please first call InitializeFFT, and then use the TakeData method of your choice to set the data" << std::endl;
00085             return;
00086         }
00087 
00088         if (fTimeData == NULL) fTimeData = new TArrayD(array->GetSize());
00089         else if (fTimeData->GetSize() != array->GetSize())
00090         {
00091             delete fTimeData;
00092             fTimeData = new TArrayD(array->GetSize());
00093         }
00094 
00095         for (Int_t iPoint=0; iPoint<array->GetSize(); iPoint++)
00096         {
00097             (*fTimeData)[iPoint] = (Double_t)(array->GetAt(iPoint));
00098         }
00099         fIsDataReady = kTRUE;
00100         return;
00101     }
00102 
00103     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::Transform()
00104     {
00105         if (! fIsInitialized)
00106         {
00107             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSlidingWindowFFT::Transform: FFT must be initialized before the transform is performed" << std::endl;
00108             std::cerr << "   Please first call InitializeFFT(), then use a TakeData method to set the data, and then finally perform the transform." << std::endl;
00109             return;
00110         }
00111 
00112         if (! fIsDataReady)
00113         {
00114             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSlidingWindowFFT::Transform: The data for the transform is not ready"<< std::endl;
00115             std::cerr << "   Please first call TakeData, and then perform the transform" << std::endl;
00116             return;
00117         }
00118 
00119         while (! fPowerSpectra.empty())
00120         {
00121             delete fPowerSpectra.back();
00122             fPowerSpectra.pop_back();
00123         }
00124 
00125         if (fWindowFunction->GetSize() < this->GetFullTimeSize())
00126         {
00127             Int_t windowShift = fWindowFunction->GetSize() - fOverlap;
00128             std::cout << "window shift: " << windowShift << std::endl;
00129             //Int_t nWindows = 1 + TMath::FloorNint((Double_t)(this->GetFullTimeSize() - fWindowFunction->GetSize()) / (Double_t)windowShift);
00130             Int_t iWindow = 0;
00131             for (Int_t windowStart=0; windowStart + fWindowFunction->GetSize() <= this->GetFullTimeSize(); windowStart += windowShift)
00132             {
00133                 //std::cout << "window: " << iWindow+1 << "; window start: " << windowStart << std::endl;
00134                 for (Int_t iPoint=windowStart; iPoint<windowStart+fWindowFunction->GetSize(); iPoint++)
00135                 {
00136                     fTransform->SetPoint(iPoint-windowStart, (*fTimeData)[iPoint] * fWindowFunction->GetWeight(iPoint-windowStart));
00137                 }
00138                 fTransform->Transform();
00139                 fPowerSpectra.push_back(this->CreatePowerSpectrum());
00140                 iWindow++;
00141             }
00142             std::cout << "FFTs complete; windows used: " << iWindow << std::endl;
00143         }
00144 
00145         return;
00146     }

00148     TH2D* KTSlidingWindowFFT::CreatePowerSpectrumHistogram() const
00149     {
00150         if (fPowerSpectra.empty()) return NULL;
00151 
00152         // plot in MHz, instead of Hz
00153         Double_t freqMult = 1.e-6;
00154 
00155         Double_t effTimeWidth = (Double_t)(fPowerSpectra.size() * fWindowFunction->GetSize() - (fPowerSpectra.size()-1) * fOverlap);
00156         effTimeWidth *= fWindowFunction->GetBinWidth();
00157         TH2D* hist = new TH2D("hPowerSpectra", "Power Spectra",
00158                 fPowerSpectra.size(), 0., effTimeWidth,
00159                 this->GetFrequencySize(), -0.5 * fFreqBinWidth * freqMult, fFreqBinWidth * ((Double_t)this->GetFrequencySize()-0.5) * freqMult);
00160         std::cout << "Frequency axis: " << this->GetFrequencySize() << " bins; range: " << hist->GetYaxis()->GetXmin() << " - " << hist->GetYaxis()->GetXmax() << " MHz" << std::endl;
00161         std::cout << "Time axis: " << fPowerSpectra.size() << " bins; range: 0 - " << effTimeWidth << " s" << std::endl;
00162 
00163         for (Int_t iBinX=1; iBinX<=(Int_t)fPowerSpectra.size(); iBinX++)
00164         {
00165             KTPowerSpectrum* ps = fPowerSpectra[iBinX-1];
00166             for (Int_t iBinY=1; iBinY<=this->GetFrequencySize(); iBinY++)
00167             {
00168                 hist->SetBinContent(iBinX, iBinY, ps->GetMagnitudeAt(iBinY-1));
00169             }
00170         }
00171 
00172         hist->SetXTitle("Time (s)");
00173         hist->SetYTitle("Frequency (MHz)");
00174         return hist;
00175     }
00176 
00177     KTPowerSpectrum* KTSlidingWindowFFT::CreatePowerSpectrum() const
00178     {
00179         // Extract the transformed data
00180         Int_t freqSize = this->GetFrequencySize();
00181         Double_t* freqSpecReal = new Double_t [freqSize];
00182         Double_t* freqSpecImag = new Double_t [freqSize];
00183         fTransform->GetPointsComplex(freqSpecReal, freqSpecImag);
00184 
00185         KTComplexVector* freqSpec = new KTComplexVector(freqSize, freqSpecReal, freqSpecImag, "R");
00186         delete [] freqSpecReal; delete [] freqSpecImag;
00187         (*freqSpec) *= 1. / (Double_t)this->GetTimeSize();
00188 
00189         KTPowerSpectrum* powerSpec = new KTPowerSpectrum();
00190         powerSpec->TakeFrequencySpectrum(*freqSpec);
00191         powerSpec->SetBinWidth(fWindowFunction->GetBinWidth());
00192         delete freqSpec;
00193         return powerSpec;
00194     }

00196     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::SetWindowSize(Int_t nBins)
00197     {
00198         fWindowFunction->SetSize(nBins);
00199         delete fTransform;
00200         fTransform = new TFFTRealComplex(nBins, kFALSE);
00201         fIsInitialized = kFALSE;
00202         return;
00203     }
00204 
00205     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::SetWindowLength(Double_t wlTime)
00206     {
00207         fWindowFunction->SetLength(wlTime);
00208         delete fTransform;
00209         fTransform = new TFFTRealComplex(fWindowFunction->GetSize(), kFALSE);
00210         fIsInitialized = kFALSE;
00211         return;
00212     }
00213 
00214     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::SetWindowFunction(KTWindowFunction* wf)
00215     {
00216         delete fWindowFunction;
00217         fWindowFunction = wf;
00218         fTransform = new TFFTRealComplex(fWindowFunction->GetSize(), kFALSE);
00219         fIsInitialized = kFALSE;
00220         return;
00221     }
00222 
00223     void KTSlidingWindowFFT::SetOverlap(Double_t overlapTime)
00224     {
00225         this->SetOverlap(TMath::Nint(overlapTime / fWindowFunction->GetBinWidth()));
00226         return;
00227     }
00228 
00229     Int_t KTSlidingWindowFFT::GetWindowSize() const
00230     {
00231         return fWindowFunction->GetSize();
00232     }
